Can you please attach the .log file from the .metadata directory

It seems that some of the plugins were not properly loaded; you usually get 
this error when the launch configuration fails to instantiate the launcher 
class

I assume you are missing some dependencies, such as EMF. For the list of 
dependencies required to run TPTP go to http://eclipse.org/tptp/ > Latest 
Downloads and check the Requirements section down the page.

Created an attachment (id=27667)
I am attaching the .log file. 

I have also checked the dependencies, they all exist. Another wierd thing is
the profile toolbar button doesnot appear on the tool bar.

The problem is similar with 110867

Some TPTP dependencies don't match the TPTP version. I assume that the EMF 
version doesn't match the TPTP 4.0 level

The EMF version should be 2.1.0
Hubert, can you please take a look; it might be that TPTP 4.0 shows that is 
compatible with higher versions of EMF, which is not the case

As a workaround can you please try to get the EMF 2.1 from the TPTP 4.0 
download page:
http://eclipse.org/tptp/
then select Latest Downloads and look for the Requirements section down the 
page

Created an attachment (id=27682)
.log file 

I installed EMF2.1 SDK andnow on doing profile it comes up with a window. But
the Apply buttonis disabled. When I try and click on "New" nothing happens
noticed the following in the log file
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
org/eclipse/hyades/trace/ui/internal/launcher/ProfileTab
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.launch.tabGroups.TestLaunchConfigurationTabFactory.createProfilingTab(TestLaunchConfigurationTabFactory.java:67)


I did check the core_ui.jar file inder the org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui folder
and found the ProfileTab class in the jar file. I am also attaching the .log
file for reference
It started working after I installed Eclipse SDK. Please close this bug.
